exp.title: Experience
exp.text: I have been a developer for 7 years. I usually made webs in the HTML4 era when I was younger. I wanted to be an illustrator but it wasn't made for me. Decid칤 estudiar ingenier칤a inform침atica y al termianr comence haciendo aplicaciones m칩biles con Android. Al poco comence con el desarrollo web y me especialic칠 en el desarrollo front. Mainly I worked in consulting companies developing for medium-large size companies such as Odigeo, inditex and EUIPO/WIPO.
